metadata.title: CVE-2020-12404 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: For native-to-JS bridging the app requires a unique token to be passed thatensures non-app code can't call the bridging functions. That token couldleak when used for downloading files. This vulnerability affects Firefoxfor iOS < 26.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
